HediffDef.label: advanced archotech death glare
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech "death glare". Can fire at targets independently, even in melee.

li.label: advanced archotech death glare
li.description: Fires a stream of slugs at high velocity. Each is charged with unstable energy as it leaves the miniaturized acceleration rail. Can be fired while performing other tasks.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech death glare
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial eye built by an archotech. In addition to its various enhanced vision modes and boosted visual acuity, it has been fitted with heavy, rapid-firing pulse weaponry. Since the weapon only needs eyesight and a mental trigger to fire, it can even be used in melee.\n\nThis advanced version fires 20 shots per burst, up from 5.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech death glare
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech death glare.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech programmable eye
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech programmable eye. Its efficacy scales with the Intellectual skill of the user.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech programmable eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial eye built by an archotech. It appears to be an ordinary eye, but is entirely composed out of archites - microscopic machines beyond human understanding. The host can mentally command the archites, reshaping the eye as the situation demands. More intellectually skilled hosts can even create programmed forms that surpass the efficacy of other advanced archotech eyes.\n\nThis advanced version grants +30% part efficiency per Intellectual skill (up from +8%).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech programmable eye
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech programmable eye.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech echolocator
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech echolocator. It generates sound waves by striking the contours of the host's presence in the psychic manifold, then uses them to provide detailed sonar mapping of the environment to boost hearing, moving, and manipulation. The effect's efficacy scales with the host's psychic sensitivity, and it further strengthens if the host has weak or nonexistent vision.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech echolocator
ThingDef.description:
An advanced artificial ear built by an archotech. It generates sound waves by striking the contours of the host's presence in the psychic manifold, then uses them to provide detailed sonar mapping of the environment to boost moving and manipulation. The effect's efficacy scales with the host's psychic sensitivity.

The benefits provided by this bionic strengthen if the host has weak or nonexistent vision.

At 100% sight and psychic sensitivity, this advanced version provides 1.3x hearing and manipulation, and 1.15x moving.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech echolocator
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech echolocator.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech food disintegrator
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech food disintegrator. Grants a powerful, rapid melee attack that grants nutrition based on damage dealt to organic victims.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech food disintegrator
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial jaw which breaks down food not by mechanical crushing action, but by enveloping the victim in a maelstrom of overlapping repulsion fields which quickly break it down into its constituent components. When used to attack, this process will grant nutrition per damage taken by the victim, so long as the victim is organic.\n\nThis advanced version grants +1000% eating speed (up from +160%) and its disintegration attack deals double damage.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech food disintegrator
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech food disintegrator.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech skill hoarder
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech skill hoarder.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech skill hoarder
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which greatly slows the loss of technical knowledge by means utterly unknown to mortal minds.\n\nThis advanced version grants ten times the consciousness boost and all but totally negates skill loss.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech skill hoarder
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech skill hoarder.

RecipeDef.label: remove advanced archotech skill hoarder
RecipeDef.description: Remove advanced archotech skill hoarder.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech worship drive
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech worship drive. IA! IA!

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech worship drive
ThingDef.description:
A brain implant that, in addition to enhancing consciousness, compels the host to endlessly glorify and extol the archotechs. Hosts are incapable of believing in any non-archist ideoligion, and gain psychic assistance from this implant when attempting to convert others. As with any other work of the archotechs, the reasons for this device's construction are inscrutable.

Once implanted, the worship drive seemingly dissolves, preventing surgical removal.

This advanced version grants ten times the consciousness boost and six times the conversion power.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech worship drive
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech worship drive.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech truelife
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech truelife. Rapidly restores the host to a normal state of life if it is a shambler.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech truelife
ThingDef.description: A brain implant which stabilizes deadlife mechanites and co-opts them to instead reconstruct a healthy version of the host's body; if the host becomes a shambler, ghoul, or other dark archotechnological mutant, this implant will rapidly reverse that state and bring them back to true life, hence the name.\n\nIt also provides a slow but continual regenerative effect.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech truelife
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech truelife.

RecipeDef.label: remove advanced archotech truelife
RecipeDef.description: Remove advanced archotech truelife.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech gravitonmind
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech gravitonmind. Grants bonus consciousness for 4 days after flying on a gravship.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech gravitonmind
ThingDef.description: An advanced brain implant which is more than smart enough to be its own mind. However, it is only active within 4 days of exposure to gravitic flux - such as that created by a gravship in flight.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech gravitonmind
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech gravitonmind.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech dryadic resonator
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech dryadic resonator.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech dryadic resonator
ThingDef.description: This whorled, woodlike orb is actually a bionic implant of archotech origin. Once installed in a living, sapient host, it broadcasts a psychic wave that amplifies the host's dryadic telempathy, increasing the number of dryads connected gauranlen trees can support.\n\nThis advanced version multiplies the max dryad count by 5 (up from 1.5).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech dryadic resonator
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech dryadic resonator.

RecipeDef.label: remove advanced archotech dryadic resonator
RecipeDef.description: Remove advanced archotech dryadic resonator.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech bioferrite destabilizer
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech bioferrite destabilizer. Prevents ghoulizing, rising as a shambler, and metalhorror infections.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech bioferrite destabilizer
ThingDef.description: An implant which manipulates local psychic flows, forcing the destruction of bioferrite-dependent biological modifications undergone by the host. It also induces this same destabilization in those the host attacks, allowing them to dispatch unnatural entities with relative ease.\n\nThis advanced version grants quadruple the damage boost against unnatural entities.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech bioferrite destabilizer
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech bioferrite destabilizer.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech graviton shielder
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech graviton shielder implant. Once exposed to the gravitic flux of a gravship in flight, it generates a shield.\n\nUnlike a regular shield, it does not regenerate over time, but it cannot be destroyed by EMPs and does not prevent the host from using ranged attacks.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech graviton shielder
ThingDef.description: An advanced implanted organ which absorbs graviton emissions while flying on a gravship to produce a durable projectile-repulsion field. This shield lasts until destroyed, isn't broken by EMPs, and does not prevent the host from using ranged attacks, but does not regenerate.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech graviton shielder
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech graviton shielder.

RecipeDef.label: remove advanced archotech graviton shielder
RecipeDef.description: Remove advanced archotech graviton shielder.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech graviton refresher
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech graviton refresher implant. Upon exposure to the gravitic flux of a gravship in flight, it lowers all ability cooldowns by 5 days.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech graviton refresher
ThingDef.description: An advanced implanted organ which absorbs graviton emissions while flying on a gravship to do ... something ... that defies all attempt at explanation by human minds, partially refreshing the cooldowns of all of the host's abilities.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech graviton refresher
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech graviton refresher.

RecipeDef.label: remove advanced archotech graviton refresher
RecipeDef.description: Remove advanced archotech graviton refresher.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech marrowheart
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech marrowheart.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech marrowheart
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial heart created by an archotech. It secretes archites into the bloodstream, which seek out bone marrow and, through means mysterious to all human minds, enhances the production of virtually every cell, mechanite, or chemical being produced by that tissue.\n\nThis advanced version grants triple the boost to synthetic marrow efficiency, and also enables the installation of two additional synthetic marrow implants.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech marrowheart
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech marrowheart.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech apeliotan lung
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech apeliotan lung. Improves the breathing of anyone nearby, including mechanoids.

li.visTooltip: Adjust the visibility of the Advanced Apeliotan Lung aura. This does not affect its function.\n\nIf this pawn stops being player-controlled, the aura's visibility will reset to unconditional visibility.
li.visTooltipFantasy: Adjust the visibility of the Advanced Apeliotan Lung aura. This does not affect its function.\n\nIf this pawn stops being player-controlled, the aura's visibility will reset to unconditional visibility.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech apeliotan lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung built by an archotech. Every exhalation is accompanied by a flux in the atomic composition of the surrounding air, enhancing its quality and making it particularly breathable without altering its flammability.\n\nThis advanced version's aura has a radius of 6.5 cells (up from 3 cells) and can affect mechanoids.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech apeliotan lung
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech apeliotan lung.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech breathtaker
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech breathtaker. Can be toggled to hinder the breathing and movement of anyone nearby (including mechanoids). Destroys gases within half that radius.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech breathtaker
ThingDef.description: An artificial lung built by an archotech. Instead of relying on airflow through the respiratory system, this lung uses microscopic skipgates to take in nearby air. For reasons not understood by any except presumably the archotech that created it, it can be mentally commanded to skip far more air than is actually necessary to breathe - the rest of it will get teleported somewhere else. This destroys nearby gases and makes it difficult for anyone nearby to breathe, but has the nice side effect of lowering their flammability.\n\nThis advanced version's aura has a radius of 6.5 cells (up from 3 cells) and can affect mechanoids.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech breathtaker
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech breathtaker.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech programmable lung
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech programmable lung. Its efficacy scales with the Intellectual skill of the user.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech programmable lung
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial lung built by an archotech. It appears to be an ordinary lung, but is entirely composed out of archites - microscopic machines beyond human understanding. The host can mentally command the archites, reshaping the lung as the situation demands. More intellectually skilled hosts can even create programmed forms that surpass the efficacy of other advanced archotech lungs.\n\nThis advanced version grants +30% part efficiency per Intellectual skill (up from +8%).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech programmable lung
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech programmable lung.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech growth stimulator
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech growth stimulator.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech growth stimulator
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial liver created by an archotech. Vanometrically empowered archites facilitate dramatic metabolic and structural changes to the body, rapidly increasing its size and strength.\n\nThis advanced version grants +350% melee damage (up from +125%), +2 c/s move speed (up from 0.5 c/s), 6x carrying capacity (up from 2x), and even more body size.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech growth stimulator
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech growth stimulator.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech thinking kidney
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech thinking kidney.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech thinking kidney
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial kidney created by an archotech. The actual functions of the kidney take place in a miniaturized chamber, leaving room for a complex matrix of archite-infused biogel which enhances the host's thought processes.\n\nThis advanced version grants over triple the consciousness and psychic sensitivity.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech thinking kidney
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech thinking kidney.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech intercessor
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech intercessor. Gains 1 charge per 4 hours, up to a max of 5 charges; whenever damage is taken, 1 charge is spent to nullify it.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech intercessor
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial organ created by an archotech. Despite its appearance as a lumpy, smooth-textured wad of slightly translucent plastic, it can be used as a substitute for most internal organs, significantly bolstering their function. The primary purpose of an intercessor, however, is to protect its host; it builds charges of vanometric energy over time, and when the host would take damage, that energy is somehow expended to negate the damage fully. How this works is a mystery to all human minds.\n\nThis advanced version can store up to 5 charges, and gains 1 charge every 4 hours (up from 12).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech intercessor
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech intercessor.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech programmable limb
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech programmable limb. Its efficacy scales with the Intellectual skill of the user.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech programmable limb
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial limb built by an archotech. It appears to be an ordinary limb, but it is almost entirely composed of archites - microscopic machines beyond human understanding. The host can mentally command the archites, reshaping the limb as the situation demands. More intellectually skilled hosts can even create programmed forms that surpass the efficacy of other advanced archotech limbs.\n\nThis advanced version grants +30% part efficiency per Intellectual skill (up from +8%).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech programmable limb
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech programmable limb.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech thinking spine
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech thinking spine.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech thinking spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine created by an archotech. The segments of this spinal cord are connected by interwoven strands of an organo-metallic substance which somehow enhance the host's thought processes.\n\nThis advanced version grants 1.4x consciousness (up from 1.1x).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech thinking spine
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech thinking spine.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech undulating spine
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech undulating spine. Due to its levitation-granting properties, it nullifies slowdown from different terrain types.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech undulating spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine created by an archotech. Each of its segments contains a miniature vanometric power generator, which expels the created energy as a modulated propulsive field - in other words, it makes its host levitate. This 'levitation field' subtly fluctuates, causing the host to undulate slightly while it is active, hence the spine's name.\n\nThis advanced version has triple the melee dodge and hit chance, and it doubles carrying capacity.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech undulating spine
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech undulating spine.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech graviton spine
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech graviton spine. Gains part efficiency for 5 days after flying on a gravship.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech graviton spine
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial spine created by an archotech. The spine's ability to transmit and process signals is somehow greatly enhanced by exposure to gravitic flux - such as that produced by a gravship in flight.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech graviton spine
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech graviton spine.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech telescoping arm
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech telescoping arm. Can grab objects at a distance, either to pull them to oneself or vice versa.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech telescoping arm
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm built by an archotech. In addition to the already superb functions of an archotech arm, it can extend out to disturbingly long distances in order to grab objects, then rapidly retract in order to either bring the object to oneself or oneself to the object.\n\nThis advanced version can grab objects up to 27 cells away (up from 9 cells) and has a base cooldown of 3/4 hours (down from 1 hour).

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech telescoping arm
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech telescoping arm.

AbilityDef.label: advanced bionic lasso
AbilityDef.description: Grabs a distant object, creature, building, or tree. If the target is immobile or too heavy to carry, the caster is rapidly pulled to its location; otherwise, it is brought to the caster's position.\n\nOnly goes on cooldown if used to move the caster or another creature.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech shield bubbler
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech shield bubbler.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech shield bubbler
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm built by an archotech. In addition to the already superb functions of an archotech arm, it can somehow induce electromagnetic distortions to create projectile-repulsion fields at a distance. Since these fields are not being constantly maintained by a dedicated shield-core, they collapse after a short duration. However, they are quite strong.\n\nThis advanced version produces a shield four times as strong.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech shield bubbler
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech shield bubbler.

AbilityDef.label: project advanced bionic shield
AbilityDef.description: Erects a temporary 800-energy repulsion shield over the target creature. This shield blocks projectiles but will instantly be destroyed when exposed to EMPs.

HediffDef.label: projected shield
HediffDef.description: A projectile-repulsion field generated by an archotech shield bubbler. It will attempt to stop incoming damage of all kinds. It prevents the wearer from firing out, and shuts down instantly if hit by EMP.\n\nThis shield takes damage after any shields generated by equipment. Since it is nearly skintight, it is possible to fire ranged weapons through it. It does not regenerate after running out of energy.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech sentience catalyzer
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech sentience catalyzer.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech sentience catalyzer
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial arm built by an archotech. In addition to the already superb functions of an archotech arm, it produces mechanites capable of enhancing the neural pathways of animals. By simply touching an animal, it can imbue it with sapience on par with a human.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech sentience catalyzer
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech sentience catalyzer.

AbilityDef.label: catalyze sapience
AbilityDef.description: Inject mechanites into the targeted animal's neural pathways, enhancing its intelligence to humanlike levels.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech earthshaker
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech earthshaker. Can be toggled to, after landing from any jump, release a shockwave that stuns anyone nearby, produces smoke, and damages buildings.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech earthshaker
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial leg built by an archotech. In addition to the already superb functions of an archotech leg, the earthshaker contains a ground-directed vanometric energy generator. This generator can be mentally commanded to release pulses of energy for propulsion, facilitating leaps that cover vast distances. Moreover, it can be mentally toggled to also discharge an energy pulse into the ground when landing after a jump, causing a powerful shockwave that damages buildings, throws up particulate, and stuns anyone nearby.\n\nThis advanced version quadruples both the damage boost against buildings and the increased leap range. It also doubles the stun duration of the leap shockwave.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech earthshaker
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech earthshaker.

HediffDef.label: advanced archotech generator leg
HediffDef.description: An installed advanced archotech generator leg. Affects abilities granted by other bionics, and quarters the time it takes for an internal shield generator's shield to reset after being broken.

ThingDef.label: advanced archotech generator leg
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial leg built by an archotech. In addition to the already superb functions of an advanced archotech leg, it generates energy from the body's motion, from vibrations in surfaces it makes contact with, and through miniature vanometric processes. This energy is used to fuel other bionics' abilities, lower the amount of time it takes for an internal shield generator to reset its shield after being broken, and prolong the amount of time the host can go without sleep.

RecipeDef.label: install advanced archotech generator leg
RecipeDef.description: Install an advanced archotech generator leg.
